Prerequisites: ACG 3113 WITH A MINIMUM GRADE OF C AND QMB 3302 - BUSINESS ANALYTICS WITH A MINIMUM GRADE OF C.
Course Description: AN EXTENSION OF ACG 3113 INCLUDING ADVANCED STUDY OF EARNINGS, SPECIAL LONG-TERM LIABILITIES, INVESTMENTS, DERIVATIVES, THE STATEMENT OF CASH FLOWS, AND THE NOTES TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MAY BE TAKEN BEFORE OR CONCURRENTLY WITH ACG 4632.
Textbook(s): INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNTING, 13TH EDITION. KIESO & WEYGANDT JOHN WILEY & SONS NY
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
